title: Quantity - much, many, any, a few, a little, few and little
instructions: Complete the sentences with B1muchB2, B1manyB2, B1anyB2, B1a fewB2, B1fewB2, B1a littleB2 or B1littleB2.

sentence: CDs?' 'No, I haven't, but I have
remarks: Corr: many. It's a question and 'CDs' is countable, so only 'many' is correct.
Corr: a few. It's a statement and 'cassettes' is countable, only 'a few' is correct.
